dcterms:creator: Hanxiao Liu
Karen Simonyan
Yiming Yang
dcterms:description: CIFAR-10 is a dataset containing 50,000 training images and 10,000 testing images, equally partitioned into 10 categories, with each image having a resolution of 32x32 pixels.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10

dcterms:creator: Hanxiao Liu
Karen Simonyan
Yiming Yang
dcterms:description: CIFAR-100 is a dataset similar to CIFAR-10 but contains 100 classes with 600 images each, totaling 50,000 training images and 10,000 testing images, with each image having a resolution of 32x32 pixels.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-100

dcterms:creator: Alex Krizhevsky
Ilya Sutskever
Geoffrey E Hinton
dcterms:description: ImageNet is a large-scale dataset consisting of 1.3 million training images and 50,000 testing images, equally distributed among 1,000 classes, with images having a resolution of 224x224 pixels.
dcterms:title: ImageNet
